questions.questionText: Which organization awards the Nobel Prize?
questions.explanation: The Nobel Foundation administers the Nobel Prizes established by Alfred Nobel
G20 is the Group of Twenty, an intergovernmental forum of major economies

questions.questionText: What is India's highest civilian award?
questions.explanation: Bharat Ratna is India's highest civilian award

questions.questionText: The headquarters of United Nations is located in?
questions.explanation: The UN headquarters is located in New York City, USA
WHO is the World Health Organization, a specialized agency of the UN

questions.questionText: BRICS is a group of how many countries?
questions.explanation: BRICS originally had 5 members: Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa

questions.questionText: The Olympic Games are held every how many years?
questions.explanation: The Summer Olympic Games are held every 4 years

questions.questionText: Which of these is NOT a Padma Award?
questions.explanation: Padma Ratna does not exist. The three Padma Awards are Vibhushan, Bhushan, and Shri
